00042 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::TestFileId()
00043 {
00044         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_tiling_file");
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00046         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp != NULL);
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->FileId() == "0000039321-1131034775-0000032391-0000005436-0000004827");
00049         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetGenericData()->FileIdentifier() == "0000039321-1131034775-0000032391-0000005436-0000004827");
00050 }
00051 
00052 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::testReadNonTiling()
00053 {
00054         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_expression_file");
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00056         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp == NULL);
00058         delete chp;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void FusionCHPTilingDataTest::testRead()
00062 {
00063         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read("../../parsers/data/CHP_tiling_file");
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chp != NULL);
00065         FusionCHPTilingData *tileChp = FusionCHPTilingData::FromBase(chp); 
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp != NULL);
00067 
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetNumberSequences() == 2);
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetAlgName() == L"tile");
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00071 
00072         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = tileChp->GetAlgParams();
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00074         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00075         ParameterNameValueType &param = *it;
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"p1");
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"v1");
00078 
00079         const double eps=0.00001;
00080         CHPTilingEntry e;
00081         TilingSequenceData seq;
00082 
00083         tileChp->OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(0);
00084         seq = tileChp->GetTilingSequenceData();
00085         
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n1");
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g1");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v1");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00090         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00091         param = *it;
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq1_p1");
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq1_v1");
00094 
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(0) == 2);
00096         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 10);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 10.0f, eps);
00099 
00100         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 20);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 20.0f, eps);
00103 
00104 
00105         tileChp->OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(1);
00106         seq = tileChp->GetTilingSequenceData();
00107         
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n2");
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g2");
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v2");
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00112         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00113         param = *it;
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq2_p1");
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq2_v1");
00116 
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(1) == 3);
00118         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 11);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 11.0f, eps);
00121 
00122         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 21);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 21.0f, eps);
00125 
00126         tileChp->GetTilingSequenceEntry(2, e);
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 31);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 31.0f, eps);
00129         
00130         delete tileChp;
00131 }
